A4.text: The act outlaws discrimination based on race.

A5.text: The act outlaws discrimination based on sex.

A6.text: It prohibits racial segregation in schools.

A7.text: Title VI – nondiscrimination in federally assisted programs

A8.text: It prohibits unequal application of voter registration requirements.

A9.text: This title is not intended to apply to foreign assistance programs.

A11.text: outlaws discrimination based on race, color, religion, sex, and national origin.

A13.text: Title VII protects gay, lesbian, and transgender individuals from sex‑based discrimination in the workplace
